## ams.amc shell

Open a shell inside a running instance

### Synopsis

Open a shell inside a running instance.

This command is an alias for 'amc exec <id> -- su -l'.


```
ams.amc shell <instance_id> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
$ amc shell cbluej507mpg272hdmo0
root@ams-cbluej507mpg272hdmo0:~# 
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for shell
```
